resource.name: Personal Income Tax Statistics By Zip Code
resource.description: This dataset contains data from California resident tax returns filed with California adjusted gross income and self-assessed tax listed by zip code.  This dataset contains data for taxable years 1992 to the most recent tax year available.

resource.name: Corp Annual Report Excel 2015
resource.description: Excel Summary of the Department's major program activities and statistical profile of California business taxpayers.

resource.name: California Tax Expenditure Report Data
resource.description: This dataset contains tax expenditure items; such as, credits, deductions, exclusions, and elections which are part of the current California income tax system.  The data also represents part of California's tax history. This represents information that has been published each year since 2001 in the California Tax Expenditure Report.  The values have been aggregated and rounded in millions.  A tax expenditure item with the value of 1 represents 1 million dollars.

resource.description: This dataset presents the taxable year 2012 actual cost, along with the estimated cost for the subsequent five years, for many of the tax expenditures found in California income tax law. Revenue is reported in millions.
